data.title: Welcome 2016 Featured Guest, Ghost Hunters Intl’s Scott Tepperman
data.meta_description: One of the stars of Syfy Channel’s Ghost Hunters International, Scott has also made the jump from TV to movies, and is quickly becoming a familiar name in the independent horror film scene. S…
data.text:
One of the stars of Syfy Channel’s Ghost Hunters International, Scott has also made the jump from TV to movies, and is quickly becoming a familiar name in the independent horror film scene.

Scott has appeared in several notable horror film projects, including the upcoming Night of the Living Dead: Genesis, Don’t Look in the Basement 2, The Hospital 1 and 2, Camp Massacre, Hybrid: Beneath the Old Dark House, the award-winning horror short, Creepy Crawly and countless others. He has recently wrapped I Dared You! Truth or Dare 5, which he is both starring in and co-directing with legendary cult filmmaker Tim Ritter (Truth or Dare? A Critical Madness). He also has several other film projects currently in the works.

Scott is also the Co-Owner/Co-Founder of Los Bastardz Productions (LBP), an independent film production company which he runs with his close friend and frequent collaborator Jim O’Rear (ABC’s Nashville, Don’t Look in the Basement 2). Their first joint project is the upcoming 80s-style cop thriller Nightblade, which stars Jim and Scott, along with fan favorites Robert LaSardo (Nip/Tuck), Betsy Rue (My Bloody Valentine 3D) and Todd Bridges (Diff’rent Strokes). Filming begins summer 2016.

Visit Scott’s website.
